query: UPDATE users SET role = 'superadmin' WHERE open_id = (SELECT value FROM (SELECT 'thomasbork' as value) as owner_id LIMIT 1) OR email LIKE '%thomasbork%' OR name LIKE '%thomasbork%' LIMIT 1;
